document.full_text: a michigan jury on friday considered whether police acted properly by denying a permit to a controversial florida pastor who had planned to protest outside the largest u.s. mosque during its prayers.
document.title: michigan jury weighs ban on protest outside mosque
lines_and_colors: a michigan jury on friday considered whether police acted properly by denying a permit to a controversial florida pastor who had planned to protest outside the largest u.s. mosque during its prayers.
